verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H935>them,<s%> 'When you have come into the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H4186>habitations,<s%> which I give to <S%H5414>you,<s%>

and will <S%H6213>make<s%> an offering by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> or a <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> to <S%H6381>accomplish<s%> a <S%H5088>vow,<s%> or as a freewill <S%H5071>offering,<s%> or in your set <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> of the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> or of the <S%H6629>flock;<s%>

then he who <S%H7126>offers<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> a meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of a tenth part of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil:<s%>

and <S%H3196>wine<s%> for the drink <S%H5262>offering,<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin,<s%> you shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> with the burnt <S%H5262>offering,<s%> or for the <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3532>lamb.<s%>

<S%H352><s%>"'Or for a ram, you shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> for a meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth parts of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with the <S%H7992>third<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil:<s%>

and for the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> of a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

When you <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H1121>bull<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> or for a <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> to <S%H6381>accomplish<s%> a <S%H5088>vow,<s%> or for peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%>

then shall he <S%H7126>offer<s%> with the <S%H1241>bull<s%> a meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth parts of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil:<s%>

and you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> for the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> for an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Thus shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H7794>bull,<s%> or for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> or for each of the male <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> or of the young <S%H5795>goats.<s%>
According to the <S%H4557>number<s%> that you shall <S%H6213>prepare,<s%> <S%H3602>so<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H259>everyone<s%> according to their <S%H4557>number.<s%>

<S%H249><s%>"'All who are native-born shall <S%H6213>do<s%> these things in this <S%H7126>way,<s%> in offering an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

If a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> lives as a <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> with <S%H8432>you,<s%> or whoever may be among you throughout your <S%H1755>generations,<s%> and will <S%H6213>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> as you <S%H6213>do,<s%> so he shall <S%H6213>do.<s%>

For the <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> there shall be <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H1616>you,<s%> and for the stranger who lives as a <S%H1616>foreigner,<s%> a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations:<s%> as you <S%H1616>are,<s%> so shall the foreigner be <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> shall be for <S%H1616>you,<s%> and for the stranger who lives as a foreigner with <S%H1481>you.<s%>'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H935>them,<s%> 'When you come into the <S%H776>land<s%> where I bring <S%H935>you,<s%>
then it shall be that when you <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> you shall offer <S%H7311>up<s%> a wave <S%H8641>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Of the <S%H7225>first<s%> of your <S%H6182>dough<s%> you shall offer <S%H7311>up<s%> a <S%H2471>cake<s%> for a wave <S%H8641>offering:<s%> as the wave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H7311>floor,<s%> so you shall heave it.
Of the <S%H7225>first<s%> of your <S%H6182>dough<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> a wave <S%H8641>offering<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
<S%H7686><s%>"'When you shall err, and not <S%H6213>observe<s%> all these <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%>

even all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you by <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> gave <S%H1755>commandment,<s%> and onward throughout your generations;

then it shall <S%H6213>be,<s%> if it be done <S%H7684>unwittingly,<s%> without the <S%H5869>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> that all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> with the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H5262>it,<s%> and the drink offering of <S%H4941>it,<s%> according to the ordinance, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they shall be <S%H5545>forgiven;<s%> for it was an <S%H7684>error,<s%> and they have <S%H935>brought<s%> their <S%H7133>offering,<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and their sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for their <S%H7684>error:<s%>

and all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H5545>forgiven,<s%> and the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> who lives as a <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H5971>them;<s%> for in respect of all the people it was done <S%H7684>unwittingly.<s%>

<S%H5315><s%>"'If one <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H2398>sins<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly,<s%> then he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a female <S%H5795>goat<s%> <S%H1323>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old for a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H5315>soul<s%> who <S%H7683>errs,<s%> when he <S%H2398>sins<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H5545>him;<s%> and he shall be forgiven.

You shall have <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> for him who does <S%H6213>anything<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly,<s%> for him who is <S%H249>native-born<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> who lives as a <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> among <S%H8432>them.<s%>

<S%H5315><s%>"'But the soul who <S%H6213>does<s%> anything with a high <S%H7311>hand,<s%> whether he is <S%H249>native-born<s%> or a <S%H4480>foreigner,<s%> the same <S%H1442>blasphemes<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Because he has <S%H959>despised<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and has <S%H6565>broken<s%> his <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H3772>utterly<s%> be cut <S%H3772>off;<s%> his iniquity shall be on <S%H5771>him.<s%>'"

While the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> they <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7197>gathering<s%> <S%H6086>sticks<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
Those who <S%H4672>found<s%> him <S%H7197>gathering<s%> <S%H6086>sticks<s%> <S%H7126>brought<s%> him to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to all the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>
They <S%H3240>put<s%> him in <S%H4929>custody,<s%> because it had not been <S%H6567>declared<s%> what should be done to <S%H6213>him.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "The <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> him with <S%H7275>stones<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>"

All the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> him <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H7275>stoned<s%> him to <S%H4191>death<s%> with <S%H68>stones;<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> them that they should <S%H6213>make<s%> themselves <S%H6734>fringes<s%> in the <S%H3671>borders<s%> of their <S%H899>garments<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations,<s%> and that they <S%H5414>put<s%> on the <S%H6734>fringe<s%> of each <S%H3671>border<s%> a <S%H6616>cord<s%> of <S%H8504>blue:<s%>

and it shall be to you for a <S%H6734>fringe,<s%> that you may <S%H7200>look<s%> on <S%H2142>it,<s%> and remember all the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H8446>them;<s%> and that you not follow <S%H310>after<s%> your own <S%H3824>heart<s%> and your own <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> which you use to play the <S%H2181>prostitute;<s%>
that you may <S%H2142>remember<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> all my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> to your <S%H430>God.<s%>

I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to be your <S%H430>God:<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>"
